description:
His real name is Ren Wuying. Heâ€™s the head of Heavens, a street gang that operates in Beverly Hills Wharf. Ren is charismatic, and his words and actions lead the members of Heavens. He is obsessed with money and does not trust anyone other than his friends. In Aberdeen, Ren is known for being strong, sly, and having his way with words. He has rivalry against Yellow Heads and is planning to beat them one day.
Source: Official site
name: Ren
